column4: if X crashes and doesn't come back or hangs do "ctrl+alt+f1" login to your account then do "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart"
ctrl+alt+backspace is just as good isn't it?
sometiems gdm hangs and doesnt restart
my friends pc was haivng problems with this when he did the bksp command while in gnome... it works fine when in fluxbox for me
